name: owner
description: System Owner with full access to all modules and configurations

name: admin
description: Administrator with access to most modules excluding sensitive tenant billing

name: branch_manager
description: Manages a specific branch including sales staff and stock

name: optometrist
description: Eye doctor/Technician who performs eye tests and creates prescriptions

name: salesperson
description: Front desk staff handling sales orders and invoices

name: inventory_manager
description: Responsible for stock levels purchasing and transfers

name: accountant
description: Handles invoices payments and financial reporting

name: receptionist
description: Handles appointments and basic customer queries

name: crm_specialist
description: Focuses on customer relationships and marketing

name: customer
description: End-user access for the customer portal (if applicable)
